title: The Papers: Sunak's 'lay off' defence of wife, and Russia now a 'pariah'

title: 'I want my film to show that queer South Asians are thriving'
description: Queer Parivaar explores love, sexuality and gender identity among South Asian families.

title: What's causing flight disruption this Easter?

title: French winemakers fan flames to save 2022 crop
description: Sudden and sharp frosts in France this week are threatening this year's vintage.

title: Ukraine war: Fleetwood school hosts refugee family on site
description: Pupils at Rossall School in Fleetwood have refurbished a house in its grounds for the refugees.

description: Daniel Lewis, 17, is inspiring other young people to tackle the problem in his home town.

title: Chester Zoo: Rare baby wallaby emerges from mother's pouch
description: Zookeepers caught on camera the moment the dusky pademelon first peeked out of its mum's pouch.

title: Shock result in particle experiment could spark physics revolution
description: Scientists find a sub-atomic particle's mass is at odds with one a theory underpinning modern physics.

description: A video has emerged which purports to show Ukrainian forces shooting a captive Russian soldier.

description: The new energy strategy will not help bills or carbon emissions in the short run, critics say.

description: The government wants to boost UK energy production and independence as household bills soar.

title: Tesco staff to see pay rise to £10.10 an hour
description: The supermarket says 5.8% rise in pay reflects the hard work of staff in its stores and warehouses.

title: Rishi Sunak faces questions over wife Akshata Murty's non-dom tax status
description: Labour accuses the chancellor of "breathtaking hypocrisy" over a legal tax scheme used by his wife.

title: Nato: Ukraine asks for 'weapons, weapons, weapons'

title: Grand National 2022: Eclair Surf and Fortescue make cut as Aintree line-up named
description: Eclair Surf and Fortescue make the cut for Saturday's Grand National after it was announced Caribean Boy and Farclas will not run.

title: Australia election: Pensioner berates PM Scott Morrison at pub photo-op
